bibl.title: The Space of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Image and Reality.

bibl.seg: Bunbury Judith, The Development of the Capital Zone within the Nile Floodplain. Avec résumé en anglais.

Eva Subías, Pedro Azara, Jesús Carruesco, Ignacio Fiz and Rosa Cuesta (Edd.), The Space of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Image and Reality = Documenta. 22 (Tarragona, 2011) pp. 211-217, 3 figg. n./bl. et coul.; - 222.
1. Introduction. - 2. Climate and landscape change in Egypt. - 3. Case studies of Nile migration. - 4. The context of texts. - 5. Nature versus nurture. - 6. Conclusions.
